title: PLEASE FIX THIS BUG!!
body:
So i've noticed this bug in game where say you stun a champion or poly morph them
and possibly other abilities I don't know or haven't realised, The champion will be stunned or poly morphed but 
can still use abilities they shouldn't be able to?
Like today I was playing as Morgana and stunned Tristana, it hit her and stunned her but she could still jump away and be stunned where she
landed. This happened every time and made it extremely annoying to try and stun because she could just get away anyway and avoid my W and damage.

This really needs to be fixed because it's making playing against these kind of champs really annoying and unfair {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body:
Trist's W has an activation time but not an interruptible cast time which is what makes it look weird, there's a wind up but not one that can be interrupted with a stun. 

A snare/root will stop her jump because it disables movement, but a stun only disables action, so even if she gets stunned she will continue through the air and just be unable to do anything else. 

It makes sense if you think about it, she's flying through the air, even if she gets stunned that's not going to stop her trajectory.
but isn't Morgana's Q a root?
I was under the impression you were referring to Morgana's ult. As far as I know Morg Q should stop her movement, but it's possible I have it backwards, and a stun will stop her jump but not a root.
